bilingual.source: The nvr can store up to 30 days of footage.
bilingual.target: 这个nvr（Network Video Recorder，网络视频录像机）可以存储长达30天的录像。

bilingual.source: The footage shown on TV was unedited and raw.
bilingual.target: 电视上播放的镜头是未编辑的和原始的。

bilingual.source: Scientists are studying the footage of the ufo.
bilingual.target: 科学家们正在研究那个不明飞行物的录像。

bilingual.source: The archived footage was used in the documentary.
bilingual.target: 这部纪录片使用了存档的影像资料。

bilingual.source: Editing hdv footage requires a powerful computer.
bilingual.target: 编辑高画质视频素材需要一台性能强大的电脑。

bilingual.source: The footage from the CCTV helped solve the crime.
bilingual.target: 闭路电视的录像帮助破了案。

bilingual.source: The videotape contains rare footage of the concert.
bilingual.target: 这盘录像带包含了演唱会的珍贵片段。

bilingual.source: His guilt is demonstrable through the video footage.
bilingual.target: 通过视频录像，他的罪行是可证明的。

bilingual.source: Surveillance footage helped solve the crime quickly.
bilingual.target: 监视录像帮助迅速解决了犯罪案件。

bilingual.source: The perp was identified through surveillance footage.
bilingual.target: 犯罪嫌疑人通过监控录像被识别出来。

yingyinNormal.en: Tej, what have you got? Footage, CCTV? Talk to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 泰吉，你从监控中发现什么了? 告诉我。

yingyinNormal.en: This is real footage of them moving towards a flash of light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这段实拍录像中就能看出它们的趋光性。

yingyinNormal.en: I know guys with none of that worth ten of you. I've seen the footage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多什么都不是的人比你强十倍，我见得多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes, you do. And so do the Israelis. We leaked footage of the firefight to them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当然知道，以色列人也知道了。我们把交火录像发给他们了。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't know that, Finch. The surveillance footage from the Stock Exchange was unreadable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不知道，芬奇，证交所的监控画面不清楚。

yingyinNormal.en: CNN tried to get ahold of this. We eighty-sixed it out of respect to the family. The footage?
yingyinNormal.zh: CNN想拿到这个，出于对家属的尊重，我们拒绝了。监控录像?

yingyinNormal.en: And I want you to get some good, usable footage of his killing. And then destroy everything else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你拍到杀他时好的可用的录像。然后销毁其他一切。

yingyinNormal.en: This drone I stole recorded footage of an Autobot raid. It's in pieces, but watch what happens here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个空拍机有汽车人被突袭的画面，画面很片段，但看仔细了。

yingyinNormal.en: Footage of the assassination attempt is still making its way to us, and we expect to have that shortly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刺杀未遂事件的视频还没送到，但相信很快能够公布。

yingyinNormal.en: This was supposed to last her a month, but they didn't take into account the square footage of her back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来够她用一个月的，但医生没考虑到她后背的面积。

yingyinNormal.en: I work on the Tube, on the District Line, and part of my job is to wipe the security footage after it's been cleared.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在地铁管区域线，我工作的一部分，就是看监控，没有异常就删掉。

yingyinNormal.en: If James Moriarty can hack every TV screen in the land, rest assured we have the tech to doctor a bit of security footage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然詹姆斯·莫里亚蒂能侵入我国每一台电视，那么我们当然也能篡改一份监控录像。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, now I need some footage of me reacting to Jay's speech to replace the champagne sneeze, and I'll just drop that into another table full of people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来要拍摄我听杰演讲时的镜头，来替换朝香槟打喷嚏这一段，然后把这段接到另一张一大桌人的图像里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: California, a drone caught <highlight>footage</highlight> of a USPS worker, driving through boomed homes in that van, collecting mail in an affected area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在加利福尼亚，一架无人机拍下了美国邮政工作人员开着那辆货车在受影响地区的房屋里收邮件的影片片段。
